Title:
Automatic Construction of an Effective Training Set for
Prioritizing Static Analysis Warnings
Elements_risk_assessment:
the identical line in revision X is located and
marked as a generic-bug-related line of revision X
Summary: propose an automatic approach for constructing an effective training set.
Outcome:
The precision of the top 22 warnings
for Lucene, 20 for ANT, and 6 for Spring can achieve 100% with
the help of our constructed training set
